branchItem.name: Clean Room Products
branchItem.description: <p>SMC has designed a variety of products to be used in a clean room environment.  Actuators, valves, airline equipment and speed controls have all the features needed to be a perfect fit in a clean room.</p>

branchItem.name: High Purity Products
branchItem.description: <p>In response to the latest demands in process control, SMC has incorporated leading edge product innovations and engineering excellence to develop a high purity product suite. &nbsp;These high purity solutions strive to continually advance the technology of minimizing contaminates. Achieving success as a quality leader by minimizing both particulate and chemical contamination to levels compatible with the most demanding requirements.</p>

branchItem.name: High Vacuum Products
branchItem.description: <p>Vacuum chambers are generally used in the semiconductor manufacturing process. &nbsp;The peripheral equipment used to exhaust air from the supply atmospheric pressure to the vacuum chamber such as valves, pressure switches, cylinders and gate valves should meet conditions such as non-leakage, clean specifications and corrosion resistance. &nbsp;SMC's high vacuum products meet those demands.</p>

branchItem.name: Hydraulic Equipment
Process Gas Equipment
branchItem.description: <p>AP Tech, also known as Advanced Pressure Technology, manufactures a wide assortment of gas delivery components. Founded in 1987, AP Tech has grown to be a global leader in pressure regulators and valves used for semiconductor wafer fabrication and other clean industries such as solar and flat panel displays. AP Tech also services many other industries delivering specialty and bulk gases for a wide variety of applications.</p>

branchItem.name: Secondary Battery
branchItem.description: <p>SMC has designed a variety of products to be used in secondary battery manufacturing applications. &nbsp;Actuators, valves and airline equipment are just a few on the types of products that have been designed using materials compatible with secondary battery applications as well as products to be used in a low dew point environment.</p>
